name: "The Hero"
description:
You are the hero of your world. Your adventure has come to an end as you have defeated the dragon threatening the end of you kingdom. However, during the celebration, you find an interesting item, and get sucked into "THE ABYSS"...

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Sword Attack

Space: Dash Attack / Continue Dialogue

Right Click: Knife Throw
